short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Crypto validator automatically checks if a coin is legit or has a big probability of being a scam.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Crypto validator is a new tool with no commercial purposes that provides NO FINANCIAL ADVICE.

This is a tool developed to help anyone analyze a smart contract on https://bscscan.com/ with 1-click.

Crypto Validator is still under development and it includes only a few parameters of evaluation for checking smart contracts for legitimacy.

The parameters used to check legitimacy are:
- Number of token holders
- If a smart contract is verified
